title: Surprise Me
description: Marriage is forever... or is it?   Surprise Me is the first full length Billionaire Next Door Novel!  This novel combines the steaminess of Bared to You and Fifty Shades of Grey with the romance of Nora Roberts.  Strong, sexy, and confident, Jason Powers is the world's second most powerful businessman, soon to become the first. And now he's the world's most romantic husband. After getting married, Sophia is ready to lose herself in post-marital bliss, but there's just one problem: Jason's damn phone won't stop ringing.  Jason is about to sign a deal to become the world's number one business owner but now that he's married to Sophia he can't keep his mind off her. In order to keep Sophia engaged, Jason sends her on a romantic (and passionate) scavenger hunt but skeletons from their past threaten both the scavenger hunt and their marriage.  Will they be able to save their marriage and resume their passionate honeymoon?  Click above to find out!  Note to readers: Although this novel is part of a series, it can be read as a standalone novel. NO CLIFFHANGERS! This instalment of the Billionaire Next Door is multi-POV and includes perspective from both Sophia and Jason.  This 40,000+ word novel contains strong language and explicit scenes, including steamy hot sex between two characters. Adult readers only!  keywords: new adult contemporary romance, romantic suspense, romantic thriller, marriage, women's fiction
author: Violette Paradis
